tn.esprit.querybuilder.interfaces

Interface QbSelect

  • All Superinterfaces:
    QbQuery

    public interface QbSelect
extends QbQuery
    Interface to generate a SELECT query.
    Author:
    Dhia

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  QbSelect.QbJoinType
      An enumaration of the different join types.
      static class  QbSelect.QbOrderBy
      Order ascending or descending.

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      QbSelect distinct()
      Adds the DISTINCT keyword.
      QbSelect from(java.lang.String table)
      Which table to get records from?
      QbSelect groupBy(QbField... fields)
      Takes a list of fields to group by.
      QbWhere having()
      The having clause for use with group_by.

      Similar to join but uses the db's default join type.

      Join the table to this query.

      Allows the provision of an offset and limit.

        getPlaceholderIndex, getQueryString

    • Method Detail

      • select

        QbSelect select(QbField... fields)
        Sets the list of fields to select from. Call only once per QbSelect object.
        Parameters:
        fields -
        Returns:
        This query object.

      • from

        QbSelect from(java.lang.String table)
        Which table to get records from? Call only once per QbSelect object.
        Parameters:
        table -
        Returns:
        This query object.

      • where

        QbWhere where()
        Creates the where clause builder. This must be called before any call to having(). Call only once per QbSelect object.
        Returns:
        A mutable QbWhere that is bound to this query.

      • distinct

        QbSelect distinct()
        Adds the DISTINCT keyword.
        Returns:
        This query object.

      • join

        QbSelect join(java.lang.String table,
              QbField field1,
              QbField field2,
              QbSelect.QbJoinType joinType)
        Join the table to this query. May be called multiple times.
        Parameters:
        table - - A table name without backticks.
        field1 - - A field to join on.
        field2 - - The second field to join on.
        joinType - - Join type.
        Returns:
        This query object.

      • join

        QbSelect join(java.lang.String table,
              QbField field1,
              QbField field2)
        Similar to join but uses the db's default join type. May be called multiple times.
        Parameters:
        table - - A table name without backticks.
        field1 - - A field to join on.
        field2 - - The second field to join on.
        Returns:
        This query object.

      • groupBy

        QbSelect groupBy(QbField... fields)
        Takes a list of fields to group by. Call only once per QbSelect object.
        Parameters:
        fields - - The fields to group by.
        Returns:
        This query object.

      • having

        QbWhere having()
        The having clause for use with group_by. This MUST be called after any call to where(). Call only once per QbSelect object.
        Returns:
        A QbWhere object bound to the having clause of this query.

      • orderBy

        QbSelect orderBy(QbSelect.QbOrderBy order,
                 QbField... fields)
        Used to make the ORDER BY clause. Call only once per QbSelect object.
        Parameters:
        order - - ASC or DESC.
        fields - - A list of fields to order by.
        Returns:
        This query object.

      • limit

        QbSelect limit(int offset,
               int count)
        Allows the provision of an offset and limit.
        Parameters:
        offset - - The record offset, starting at zero.
        count - - The number of records to return.
        Returns:
        This query object.
